ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Sequences encoding by using the chaos game representation. Löchel et al. (2019) <doi:10.1101/575324>.
Sequences encoding by using the chaos game representation. Löchel et al. (2019) <doi:10.1101/575324>.

name: r-kaos
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-kaos
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/kaos_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/kaos/kaos_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 13f1de43e4b0616cae534f215b1b23b80cb425c2e99440d9788436df285aff43

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-reshape2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-reshape2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('kaos')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('kaos')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=kaos
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: "Sequences encoding by using the chaos game representation. L\xF6chel et al. (2019)
    <doi:10.1101/575324>."
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: kaos
# Type: Package
# Title: Encoding of Sequences Based on Frequency Matrix Chaos Game Representation
# Version: 0.1.1
# Author: Dominik Eger and Hannah Franziska Lochel
# Maintainer: Hannah Franziska Lochel <loechelh@mathematik.uni-marburg.de>
# Description: Sequences encoding by using the chaos game representation. Lochel et al. (2019) <doi:10.1101/575324>.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Imports: ggplot2, reshape2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-05-28 10:15:02 UTC; franzi
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-05-28 10:40:02 UTC
